biotools.summary: PharmaGist is a web server for detecting pharmacophores or the spatial arrangement of features that enables a molecule to interact with a specific target receptor. Users input a set of structures of molecules that bind with the receptor for outputs of candidate pharmacophores that can be used in rational drug design.

bioschemas.name: PharmaGist
